revised_title: Fred Hoyle: A Life of Achievement and Controversy in Astrophysics
tldr: This essay review discusses the life and achievements of astrophysicist Fred Hoyle, focusing on his contributions to the fields of cosmology, including the Steady State Theory and Big Bang Theory. The review also highlights his controversies, such as his disputes with Martin Ryle and his resignation from the Institute of Astronomy at Cambridge. Despite these challenges, Hoyle's work has led to significant advancements in astronomy and his legacy continues to be influential in the field.
